question.title: Couchbase Java SDK - Warning During Initialisation
question.body:
I am getting this one warning during the initialization of my Spring Boot application.

2025-06-19 13:22:15:458 [main] DEBUG c.c.c.c.d.i.n.u.i.PlatformDependent0 - [MessageId: ] - [TraceId: ] - -Dio.netty.noUnsafe: false 2025-06-19 13:22:15:459 [main] DEBUG c.c.c.c.d.i.n.u.i.PlatformDependent0 - [MessageId: ] - [TraceId: ] - Java version: 21 2025-06-19 13:22:15:460 [main] DEBUG c.c.c.c.d.i.n.u.i.PlatformDependent0 - [MessageId: ] - [TraceId: ] - sun.misc.Unsafe.theUnsafe: available 2025-06-19 13:22:15:461 [main] DEBUG c.c.c.c.d.i.n.u.i.PlatformDependent0 - [MessageId: ] - [TraceId: ] - sun.misc.Unsafe.copyMemory: available 2025-06-19 13:22:15:462 [main] DEBUG c.c.c.c.d.i.n.u.i.PlatformDependent0 - [MessageId: ] - [TraceId: ] - sun.misc.Unsafe.storeFence: available 2025-06-19 13:22:15:463 [main] DEBUG c.c.c.c.d.i.n.u.i.PlatformDependent0 - [MessageId: ] - [TraceId: ] - java.nio.Buffer.address: available 2025-06-19 13:22:15:468 [main] DEBUG c.c.c.c.d.i.n.u.i.PlatformDependent0 - [MessageId: ] - [TraceId: ] - direct buffer constructor: unavailable java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: Reflective setAccessible(true) disabled at com.couchbase.client.core.deps.io.netty.util.internal.ReflectionUtil.trySetAccessible(ReflectionUtil.java:31) at com.couchbase.client.core.deps.io.netty.util.internal.PlatformDependent0$5.run(PlatformDependent0.java:293) at java.base/java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Unknown Source) at com.couchbase.client.core.deps.io.netty.util.internal.PlatformDependent0.(PlatformDependent0.java:286) at com.couchbase.client.core.deps.io.netty.util.internal.PlatformDependent.isAndroid(PlatformDependent.java:331) at com.couchbase.client.core.deps.io.netty.util.internal.PlatformDependent.(PlatformDependent.java:86) at com.couchbase.client.core.deps.io.netty.util.HashedWheelTimer.(HashedWheelTimer.java:115)

Using JDK 21

spring boot - 3.3.5

Couhbase Libs

what could be the impact of this warning, will there be performance issue at application end?

question_comments.body: I have asked the same question on couchbase forum couchbase.com/forums/t/…
